TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridTableStylesCollection extends System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList

summary.span: 表示 控件中 对象的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含对象，允许控件来显示每个自定义的网格样式中。The contains objects that allows the control to display a customized grid style for each in a . 上控件，属性返回。On the control, the property returns the . 默认情况下不包含任何对象。By default, the does not contain any objects. 相反，显示每个表中的颜色、 宽度和格式设置使用默认设置。Instead, the displays each table using default settings for color, width, and formatting. 显示每个表的所有列。All columns of each table are displayed. 当添加到集合中，使用来确定哪些对象提供的数据网格。When a is added to the collection, the uses the to determine which object supplies the data for the grid. 例如，如果数据源，其中包含三个对象，必须匹配的其中一个对象。For example, if the data source is a that contains three objects, the must match the of one of the objects. 如果不匹配的任何值，则默认的设置将用于显示每个表的数据和设置将被忽略。If the does not match any of the values, the default settings will be used to display data for each table, and the settings will be ignored. > [!CAUTION] > 始终创建对象，并将其添加到添加之前对象添加到。Always create objects and add them to the before adding objects to the . 当添加一个空使用一个有效值到集合中，为你自动生成的对象。When you add an empty with a valid value to the collection, objects are automatically generated for you. 如果你尝试添加新因此，将引发异常具有重复的对象值到。Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new objects with duplicate values to the . 您也可以清除使用方法。Alternatively, clear the using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建两个对象并将每个到返回的属性的控件。The following code example creates two objects and adds each to the returned by the property of a control. [!code-cpp[GridTableStylesCollectionExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GridTableStylesCollectionExamples/CPP/gridtablestylescollectionexamples.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[GridTableStylesCollectionExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GridTableStylesCollectionExamples/CS/gridtablestylescollectionexamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[GridTableStylesCollectionExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GridTableStylesCollectionExamples/VB/gridtablestylescollectionexamples.vb#1)]
